Keywords: Martial Artist , Mystical , X-Force , X-Men
Real Name: James Howlett
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Characters
(+5 POINTS) SWORD BEARER: This character starts the game with any Sword equipment equipped.
RETURNING FROM HELL, OVER AND OVER AGAIN: When Wolverine would be KO'd by an opposing effect, instead don't stop turning the dial and keep turning it for the damage taken (up to click #12), then place him on this card. // At the beginning of your turn, if Wolverine is on his card, heal him 1 click. If click #5 is revealed, your opponent places him within 4 squares of a friendly character. // If no other friendly characters on the map share a keyword with Wolverine while he is on his card, KO him. Protected: Pulse Wave.

Comments
June 13, 2022
Gensan
Since he's not actually KO'd, it would stay equipped to him. If he does get KO'd later because "no other friendly characters on the map share a keyword with Wolverine while he is on his card" then it would be automatically unequipped. If the Sword has Unequip (KO), it would be KO'd at that point. If it is has Unequip (Drop), it gets more complicated. It would normally be "placed in the previously equipped character’s square"... but since he is off the map when he is KO'd, he does not occupy a square. There are two ways that can go: The Sword is automatically KO'd, or the Sword is placed in whatever square Wolverine last occupied on the map. For ease of play I would probably go with the former, but previous rulings lean toward the second option. There is no official answer for that.
June 13, 2022
The Singularity
What happens to the sword you pay to equip him with if he uses the Returning from hell power?
